1.title: Faking My Own Death
1.plot: Matt Watson and his mates are up against the ocean's most perfect predators: Sharks.

2.title: The Marlin That Drove Me Mad
2.plot: Matt Watson and his mates take adventure fishing around the globe. Risking life and limb to plant a research tag in a monster Striped Marlin...from a jetski.

3.title: The Stunt to End All Stunts
3.plot: Matt Watson and his mates push deep-sea fishing beyond insane. Breaking a marlin tagging record with a surprise ending you have to see to believe. Matt takes adrenaline charged excitement to the ultimate extreme.

4.title: Deadman in a Dinghy
4.plot: Matt Watson and his host of crazy characters take it to the high seas. Wrestling a Bluefin behemoth with nothing but a rope from a bathtub sized boat. Hold on tight for ultimate adventure fishing pushed to the insane.

5.title: When Nature Calls
5.plot: Madman of the Sea and his mates take on the South Pacific's craziest. Battling a thousand-pound Black Marlin with an inciting Tiger Shark tug-of-war ending and facing off in a three-way dogfight to see who'll land a record-breaking dogtooth tuna.

6.title: Jinx in the Genes
6.plot: Matt Watson and mates are pushing the boundaries of deep-sea insanity. Wrestling a big Striped Marlin old-school style - all alone, in a tiny boat, with nothing but bare hands. And battling a bucking Broadbill Swordfish, as a record-junkie gets his fix.

imdb.plot outline: From a dinghy, a jet ski or even a helicopter, Matt Watson risks everything for bragging rights...and species survival. From a mission impossible to a mission insane, no challenge is out of bounds. To some, he's an adrenaline junkie searching for the ultimate rush. To others, he's simply...the MADMAN OF THE SEA.
imdb.title: Madman of the Sea
plot: From a dinghy, a jet ski or even a helicopter, Matt Watson risks everything for bragging rights...and species survival. From a mission impossible to a mission insane, no challenge is out of bounds. To some, he's an adrenaline junkie searching for the ultimate rush. To others, he's simply...the MADMAN OF THE SEA.
